attributes.action: We need a public inquiry into Russian State interference in Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Russia’s free pass to undermine British democracy 
https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2017/oct/21/russia-free-pass-undermine-british-democracy-vladimir-putin?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=twitter

http://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/russias-cyber-war-against-america-will-any-president_us_5952c35ce4b0f078efd9859e

Russia's Cyber War Against America

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-38850907

http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/why-britain-tolerates-russian-assassins-on-its-soil/article/2626194
attributes.background:
With the FBI currently investigating Russian interference in the latest US elections evidence is increasingly coming to light that our EU referendum resulting in 'Brexit' was also the target of Russian influence.

We seem to be the only country in the West not taking this threat seriously.
